The Progress method is called periodically by the method while it copies the file.

member.param: Specifies the percentage of the copy operation that has completed, as a value between 0 and 100.
member.returns: Returns S_OK or an HRESULT error code.

The IAMCopyCaptureFileProgress interface is a callback interface used by the method.

Because the CopyCaptureFile method can take a long time to complete, an application can implement this interface to receive periodic notifications about the progress of the copy operation. If the application does not need to receive this information, there is no need to implement the interface.
